title: How to write a welcome blog post - Quora

response.answer_text: A welcome blog post is a nice avenue to interact with your visitors and let them know what to expect from you. These are tips to follow First, appreciate them for visiting your blog. By the way, there are over 500 Million blogs in the world. So, be grateful to everyone visiting yours Tell them What your blog is about Focus less on your credentials ( Mention your credentials but don’t say too much about it. While reading your welcome post, visitors are more interested in “what they stand to gain”. You can tell all the stories on your “about me” page. Tell them about your results: If you are a affiliate coach, let them know you have helped over 10,000 affiliate marketers. Give them a gift: If you have a free eBook, course or any giveaway, let your readers know in your welcome post. Ensure you link to a squeeze page where they will leave their email. so, you can capture them as subscribers directly from your welcome blog post

To write a welcome blog post is not difficult. First and foremost, you first sentence will be about introducing the blog and the conclusion will be about thanking them. Make sure it’s brief and not too lengthy.
